Claude_Code_Best_Practices. CLAUDE.md should be concise (30-40k tokens), not exhaustive (was 108k). Use # key to incrementally add session-specific instructions. Explore-Plan-Code-Commit workflow is optimal. Visual targets (screenshots, mocks) improve results significantly. 2-3 iterations with visual feedback yield best quality. Multi-Claude pattern: parallel instances via git worktrees. /clear between major tasks prevents context pollution. Headless mode with -p flag enables CI/CD automation. Checklist pattern ideal for migrations and complex tasks. File-based communication between parallel Claudes

Context_Management_Strategy. Monitor context every 10 exchanges. Clear at 70% (140k tokens) proactively. Save state to Memory before clearing. Create handoff files for complex work. Use session splitting for large features. Target 70-80 exchanges per session. File-based results save ~5k tokens per sub-agent. MCP tools via sub-agents save 26k tokens

workflow_architecture. TaskMaster as single source of truth - ABSOLUTE RULE #0: ALL tasks from TaskMaster ONLY. PM Agent ALWAYS FIRST - planning before any coding. Parallel sub-agents: 2-3 (simple fixes), 5-7 (features), 10-15+ (large refactoring). 200k context window per agent. 9-Phase workflow: EXPLORE ‚Üí PM Agent ‚Üí TaskMaster ‚Üí Parallel Sub-Agents ‚Üí Build & Test ‚Üí Deploy Dev ‚Üí Playwright Test Dev ‚Üí Deploy Production ‚Üí Playwright Test Production. File locking works ‚úÖ - multiple agents can work on different files simultaneously

quality_gates. Pre-commit hooks: typecheck, lint, tests - catch errors before git history. Code Review Agent: CRITICAL/MAJOR/MINOR severity levels. QA Agent: auto-detects project type. Test Agent: AAA pattern (Arrange, Act, Assert). Playwright testing MANDATORY for all website changes (before AND after deploy). 7 quality gates total: typecheck, lint, test, build, E2E, performance (<2.5s), accessibility (WCAG AA). 85%+ QA pass rate on first try achieved

automation_systems. 90% automated workflow. Session start automation: sleep prevention, Codex/Gemini check, metrics start, health checks, context optimization. Metrics tracking: automatic session/task/error logging. Health checks: automatic at session start, proactive problem prevention. Context optimization: automatic project detection and MCP recommendations. All scripts integrated in ~/claude_session_start.sh
